Title: Possession
Plot: There is no doubt that Cassie has changed. She wears sexy tighter clothes; she is hostile with Thelma and exudes attitude. She barely takes notice of young Troy but it only makes him even more desperate to be with her. His friends can't understand why he is allowing himself to be treated this way but he can't resist her.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
